Title: Buyer
Description: The organization aiming to conclude a contract with a supplier or to use the goods, works or services resulting from the contract.

Title: Procuring entity
Description: The organization managing the contracting process. If an organization is both a buyer and a procuring entity (as can be the case in simple contracting processes), its roles should include 'buyer', but not 'procuringEntity'.

Title: Supplier
Description: An entity awarded or contracted to provide goods, works or services.

Title: Tenderer
Description: All entities who submit a tender.

Title: Funder
Description: The funder is an organization providing money or finance for this contracting process.

Title: Enquirer
Description: A party who has made an enquiry during the enquiry phase of a contracting process.

Title: Payer
Description: A party making a payment from a transaction.

Title: Payee
Description: A party in receipt of a payment from a transaction.

Title: Review body
Description: A party responsible for the review of this procurement process. This party often has a role in any challenges made to the contract award.

Title: Interested party
Description: A party that has expressed an interest in the contracting process: for example, by purchasing tender documents or submitting clarification questions.

Title: Contract implementation manager
Description: The organization responsible for managing the implementation of the contract on behalf of the buyer. (This may be different from the procuring entity that manages the contracting process.)

Title: Mediation body
Description: The body responsible for mediation procedures.

Title: Central purchasing body
Description: The procuring entity providing centralized purchasing activities and, possibly, ancillary purchasing activities.

Title: Process contact point
Description: A contact point dedicated to this contracting process.

Title: Review contact point
Description: The service from which information about the review procedure can be obtained.

Title: Information service
Description: An organization that can provide information regarding specific aspects of the contracting process.
